name: ListGithubRepoForks
description:
Fetches the list of forks for a specified GitHub repository.

This tool retrieves a list of forks for a given GitHub repository, identified by its owner and name. It should be called when you need to obtain information about the forks of a particular repository.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. This is not case sensitive and specifies whose repository to list forks from.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository. This is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: The order to sort the forks. Options: 'newest', 'oldest', 'stargazers', or 'watchers'.

value_schema.description: The sort order. `stargazers` will sort by star count.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of results to return per page, with a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: results_page_number
parameters.description: Specifies the page number for paginated results when listing forks.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sort order. `stargazers` will sort by star count.

value_schema.description: The sort order. `stargazers` will sort by star count.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
